name: PHVS_SignificantBirthInjury_NCHS
title: Significant Birth Injury (NCHS)
description: To Reflect that the newborn suffered a Significant Birth Injury (skeletal fracture(s), peripheral nerve injury, and/ or soft tissue/solid organ hemorrhage which requires intervention) reflecting an abnormal condition of the newborn.
